Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Sunnyside
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Lawrence, Ashland, Montrose and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Sunnyside.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Lawrence, Ashland, Montrose and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Sunnyside.

Allow extra travel time.
